pages.text: You think your steel production are too slow ? So there is a solution for this. fist step let's build a Advanced Coke Oven need Reinforce Blast Brick and steel sheetmetals
Required Materials:             x18 Reinforce Coke Brick       x9 Steel Sheetmetals           x1 Hopper
this oven will use as the normal one but the speed are faster, but if you want to have some upgrades for it . you can have the Coke Oven Preheater, recommened to make 2 preheater
After finish crafting 2 preheater attach them next to the oven from 2 sides left and right, to operate it input the energy source from orange square on the middle of the preheaters
